column5: I leaning towards nipissing for this Saturday. How's the ice? How much snow is on top of it today?

Dude there is lots of ice over a foot in most area's  I was there on weekend lots of cars on ice.I drive an avalanche and i was out on lake from south river by callender,there is like a foot of snow on it now but there was an easy 13' of ice where i was........
My concern is the snow that has now fallen on the ice and the resulting slush possibility.
P.M.d you.   My guess is that slushy areas got worse...but they are avoidable.   I didn't get out today but will be at the hut tomorrow. I can update you then.
When I was in front of town last weekend I was on at least 15", probably more.  I didn't measure, but it was down to the split in my fin-bore!
Thank guys. My brother has changed his mind/schedule. Now that there is two of us we've booked a day hut.
